com.opengamma.strata.pricer.swaption

Class BlackSwaptionPhysicalTradePricer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opengamma.strata.pricer.swaption.BlackSwaptionPhysicalTradePricer

  • public class BlackSwaptionPhysicalTradePricer
extends Object
    Pricer for swaption trade with physical settlement in log-normal or Black model on the swap rate.

    The swap underlying the swaption should have a fixed leg on which the forward rate is computed. The underlying swap should be single currency.

    The volatility parameters are not adjusted for the underlying swap conventions. The volatilities from the provider are taken as such.

    The present value and sensitivities of the premium, if in the future, are also taken into account.

    • Method Detail

      • presentValue

        public CurrencyAmount presentValue(SwaptionTrade trade,
                                   RatesProvider ratesProvider,
                                   BlackVolatilitySwaptionProvider volatilityProvider)
        Calculates the present value of the swaption trade.

        The result is expressed using the currency of the swapion.

        Parameters:
        trade - the swaption trade to price
        ratesProvider - the rates provider
        volatilityProvider - the Black volatility provider
        Returns:
        the present value of the swap product

      • currencyExposure

      • currentCash

        public CurrencyAmount currentCash(SwaptionTrade trade,
                                  LocalDate valuationDate)
        Calculates the current of the swaption trade.

        Only the premium is contributing to the current cash for non-cash settle swaptions.

        Parameters:
        trade - the swaption trade to price
        valuationDate - the valuation date
        Returns:
        the current cash amount

      • presentValueSensitivityStickyStrike

        public PointSensitivityBuilder presentValueSensitivityStickyStrike(SwaptionTrade trade,
                                                                   RatesProvider ratesProvider,
                                                                   BlackVolatilitySwaptionProvider volatilityProvider)
        Calculates the present value sensitivity of the swaption product.

        The present value sensitivity of the product is the sensitivity of the present value to the underlying curves.

        Parameters:
        trade - the swaption trade to price
        ratesProvider - the rates provider
        volatilityProvider - the Black volatility provider
        Returns:
        the present value curve sensitivity of the swap trade

      • presentValueSensitivityBlackVolatility

        public SwaptionSensitivity presentValueSensitivityBlackVolatility(SwaptionTrade trade,
                                                                  RatesProvider ratesProvider,
                                                                  BlackVolatilitySwaptionProvider volatilityProvider)
        Calculates the present value sensitivity to the implied volatility of the swaption trade.

        The sensitivity to the Black volatility is also called Black vega.

        Parameters:
        trade - the swaption trade to price
        ratesProvider - the rates provider
        volatilityProvider - the Black volatility provider
        Returns:
        the point sensitivity to the Black volatility
